title: Sentimental
description: A Foundry implementation of Sentiment, based on ElusiveZenith's implementation of [Lasers and Feelings] & Steve Simenic's implementation of [Basic Fantasy RPG], which is itself based on the Boilerplate System by Asacolips Projects. Hoh boy! See the Sentiment RPG at https://www.patreon.com/sentimentttrpg/
author: l1necrasher
